Title: Enacts uniform incident reporting system regarding removal of students and other persons from classrooms and school property
Summary: Enacts a uniform incident reporting system regarding removal of students and other persons from classrooms and school property; establishes a registry to include the names of all persons who are removed from classrooms and school property, name of the school district and school, name of teacher, age and grade of student, reason for removal, action taken by school, and disciplinary action against student; requires annual report to governor, legislature and board of regents; provides for reports to commissioner of education and allows him to take appropriate action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to conduct on school property
